Name: Hughes
Description:
Hughes is bound by Georges River, Newbridge Road and Davy Robinson Drive in the north, Liverpool City Council and Sutherland Shire Council in the west and south, follows Georges River, Oyster Bay, Kareela Golf Course, Box Road, Princes Highway, Kingsway, Hotham Road, North West Arm Road, Dent Creek and the Hacking River in the east. The main suburbs include Alfords Point, Bangor, Barden Ridge, Bundeena, Como, Engadine, Grays Point, Heathcote, Illawong, Kareela, Kirrawee, Lucas Heights, Maianbar, Menai, Moorebank, Sandy Point, Sutherland (part), Waterfall and Wattle Grove.
This description reflects local government areas in existence in 2015.
ProductsAndIndustry: Atomic reactor, light manufacturing industries, army barracks and military reserve.
NameDerivation: Named after William Hughes (1862-1952), Prime Minister of Australia 1915-23.
Members:
• Kelly, C (LP) 2010-
  • Vale, D (LP) 1996-2010
  • Tickner, R E (ALP) 1984-1996
  • Johnson, L R (ALP) 1969-1983
  • Dobie, J D (LP) 1966-1969
  • Johnson, L R (ALP) 1955-1966
DemographicRating: Outer Metropolitan - situated in capital cities and containing large areas of recent suburban expansion.
